title: DSP Interview Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at ENCOR in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Recruiter sets up phone interview to discuss pay, schedules, and go over pre-hire requirements. From there, recruiter schedules an in-person interview with the manager. The whole process took about 4 days and I started within two weeks.
Interview Questions: Why did you start working in this field?

title: Network Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at ENCOR (Singapore) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: There hiring manager are very professional, all the questions are related to the position they are looking for. Their first interview is via phone and next is a 1 on 1 interview this is more of a technical skills.
Interview Questions: Typical HR questions and basic understanding of network

title: Store Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at ENCOR (Omaha, NE) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Director and coordinators were uneducated on the field. They were not prepared to ask in detail questions about job performance. Instead focused more on what will you like in the future.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: The process took 5 days. I interviewed at ENCOR (Omaha, NE) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: I submitted the online application, which they reviewed and called me in for an interview. After the interview, I had to fill out a full paper application and watch a video.
Interview Questions: If a CNA was unable to make it in for their shift, how would you respond?

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at ENCOR in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Applied online got a call a day or so later. Went in to the main office took some skill test then interviewed with the HR  who passed my application on. A couple of days later went to one of the group homes.  Interviewed with supervisor. Was shown around the house, got to meet the staff and people who lived there. Was offered the job right away and accepted.
Interview Questions: Do you have any experience working in this field?

title: Appointment Setter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at ENCOR (Rice, TX) in Sept 2009
Interview Descriptions: Read a script. Speak one on one with a recruiter. Couple trick questions. Then see the show floor.
Interview Questions: What are you looking to do with your career?
